mentions.context: All the experiments have been using the clingo solver 5 on a desktop computer with enough memory to prevent from using cache 5 clingo version 5.3.1 memory and ran with a single thread.
Specifically, we rely in the sequel on the input language of the ASP system clingo [3].
All the experiments have been using the clingo solver 5 on a desktop computer with enough memory to prevent from using cache 5 clingo version 5.3.1 memory and ran with a single thread.
